title: Set Airplane mode
answer:
On the home screen, pull down the status bar, and click Airplane mode to turn on the airplane mode; uncheck it to turn off the airplane mode. In airplane mode, the wireless network is unavailable. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110276) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110277)
